name: Mr. Chaos
description:
Welcome to Redtown, a perfect place where everybody is happy. Everybody expect for you, Mr. Chaos! In this low poly FPS game you have to destroy as much as you can, as long as you can in this fully destructible environment.

This game was made for the Brackeys game jam 2021.2

Note: This game can be quite performance heavy.

Another note: This is my first ever 3D game and I didn't make the 3D models myself.
